item.title: Ben Stiller Picks $56.7M Comedy Flop As His Most Misunderstood Movie By Critics
item.description: Actor Ben Stiller reveals which of his comedy films was the most understood by critics, and it's one that flopped hard at the box office.

item.title: Moana 2's New Characters, Ranked By How Memorable They Are
item.description: Many of the new characters in Moana 2, such as Simea and the wicked storm god Nalo, add fun and exciting elements to the 2016 original film.

item.title: Nymphomaniac: The Film That Made Mia Goth A Star, Explained By The Actress Herself — "It Feels Divine"
item.description: Mia Goth is one of the most exciting young actresses working today, and her 2013 film, Nymphomaniac, put her on the map and made her a star.
